src: LC : Hello . # greet ( ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : We 're looking for a way to get to room 17 , are n't we ? # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) RP : Yes . # affirm ( ) RP : Yes , we need to go to room 17 for treatment . # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) [start] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Thank you . [MASK] [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] LC : Do you , do you know what time our appointment is ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : Do you need the name ? ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . [MASK] RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well . Could n't you speak a little louder ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . [MASK] LC : Thank you ARI , have a nice day . [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] [end] ARI : Thank you , see you around , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

[MASK] RC : So everything 's fine , we can go . We have an appointment in 5 minutes , do we have time to go there ? ARI : Yes , of course . [MASK] LP : Yes , my friend has forgotten his appointment time . He ca n't remember the doctor 's name either , can you help us please ? Will he ever move ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm going to call a nurse to come and inform you . Do you have any other questions ? [MASK] [end] RC : We 'll wait for the nurse . src: LP : Well , yeah , but you do what you want . [start] LP : What time is my appointment with the doctor ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : I think it 's 10 o'clock . [MASK] [MASK] RC : What time is the appointment ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : I have an appointment with the doctor . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . [MASK] [MASK] LP : And who is my geriatrician ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : That 's a shame . [MASK] LP : And where is the consultation room to go see my doctor ? RC : Is it my turn ? src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] RP : Can you ask if there is a cafeteria ? Because I 'd really like a coffee before the consultation . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Yes . [MASK] LC : Um hello , could you tell me the address um where the cafeteria is ? Because my friend would like to get something . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes of course . There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] [MASK] RP : I really need to go to the toilet before going to the consultation . Can you ask where the toilet is please ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : I 'm going to speak for my friend . My friend would like to go to the toilet before her consultation . Can you tell me where it is ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . [MASK] [MASK] RP : To go and see the person I told you about , I do n't know exactly where it is or which department it 's in , but it 's room 17 . Can he tell us a bit more about where this room 17 is ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : Um , do you know where room 17 is ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You continue along the building , take the lift , and it 's on the second floor . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Ok. And is it on the left or the right ... on the second floor ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . [MASK] RC : Ok . src: LC : Well , it 's not possible to get information on appointments . [MASK] [MASK] [end] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . tgt: ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RP : Ok , I 'm going to ask you a question ARI . I have an appointment at Broca hospital on the 25th , but I 'm not going to be able to make it . What do I do ? Who should I speak to ? Should I phone , what should I do ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . # cant-help ( ) LC : Is there a reception or a telephone number ? # request ( location ( reception ) ) @ G ( LC , go-to ( reception ) ) ARI : Yes . # affirm ( ) @ AG ( LC , go-to ( reception ) ) ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . # cant-help ( ) LC : Well , in the meantime , what we can maybe do , since I 've just found my appointment paper and I know what time it starts , we could maybe go for lunch . From what time until what time can we have lunch ? # request ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) @ G ( LC_RP , eat ( lunch ) ) LC : And ... Is it ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . # cant-help ( ) LC : And ... Is it possible to have lunch with someone who is hospitalised ? ARI : Yes of course . # affirm ( ) LC : How should I do this ? Do I need to make a reservation ? ARI : No . # disaffirm ( ) LC : How far in advance ? ARI : No . # disaffirm ( ) LC : I 'm going to take the lift . I do n't remember where it is to go to the appointment room and see if someone can give information on appointments . # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) ; request ( appt ( general_info ) ) @ G ( LC , go-to ( lifts ) ) ; G ( LC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) ; G ( LC , get-info ( appt ( general_info ) ) )

src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] LP : Hello , I 'd like to know where my doctor 's office is ? I have an appointment with her at 3 PM . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Do you have an appointment at 3 PM ? ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Ah , that 's very good ARI . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Do we have time for a coffee before we go ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes , of course . RC : So where can we get a coffee ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] [MASK] RC : I do n't think ARI heard because you spoke at the same time as him . ARI : Sorry , can you repeat that please ? [MASK] ARI : Do you need information ? [MASK] [end] RC : Well , we 'd just like to know where we can get a hot chocolate . # request ( beverage ( hot_chocolate ) ) @ G ( LP+RC , drink ( hot ( chocolate ) ) ) ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) @ AG ( LP+RC , drink ( hot_chocolate ) ) RC : Ah , yes . # acknowledge ( ) ARI : You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . # inform ( food ) ; inform ( drink ) @ AG ( LP+RC , drink ( hot_chocolate ) ) RC : Ah , that 's good , we 'll go there . We have time before the appointment . # acknowledge ( )
